title: Associate Software Engineer
description:
**About the Role** 




 We are looking for a passionate
 **Associate Java Developer (Fresher)** 
 to join our engineering team. This role is ideal for recent graduates who have strong fundamentals in Java programming and an eagerness to learn modern development practices. You will work closely with senior developers to build, test, and deploy high\\-quality applications.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Assist in designing, coding, testing, and debugging Java\\-based applications.
* Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code under guidance.
* Work with frameworks such as Spring, Spring Boot, Hibernate, and REST APIs (training will be provided).
* Participate in code reviews and follow best coding practices.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to understand requirements and deliver solutions.
* Support application deployment and work on minor bug fixes.
* Learn and adapt to new technologies as required.



  





**Required Skills** 



* Strong understanding of
 **Core Java** 
 , OOP concepts, collections, exception handling, and basic multithreading.
* Basic knowledge of
 **Spring / Spring Boot** 
 (academic or project experience).
* Understanding of
 **RESTful APIs** 
 and web services.
* Familiarity with SQL databases like MySQL/PostgreSQL.
* Knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript is a plus.
* Good understanding of data structures and algorithms.
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and willingness to learn.



  





**Preferred Skills** 



* Exposure to Git/GitHub version control.
* Basic understanding of Maven/Gradle.
* Internship experience or academic projects in Java.
* Familiarity with Agile methodologies.



  





**Qualifications** 



* Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science, IT, Engineering, or related fields.
* Java certifications are an added advantage but not mandatory.

title: Full-Stack AI Systems Engineer
description:
This role is for one of our clients
   

  

 Industry: Insurance
   

  

 Seniority level: Associate level
   

  

 Min Experience: 3 years
   

  

 Location: Remote (India)
   

  

 JobType: full\\-time
   

  

 We may use artificial intelligence (AI) tools to support parts of the hiring process, such as reviewing applications, analyzing resumes, or assessing responses. These tools assist our recruitment team but do not replace human judgment. Final hiring decisions are ultimately made by humans. If you would like more information about how your data is processed, please contact us.
   

  

 We are looking for highly capable engineers who thrive in high\\-ownership environments and can independently build complex systems that power next\\-generation AI agents. This role blends deep backend engineering, full\\-stack problem\\-solving, and hands\\-on work with reinforcement learning environments used by leading AI research teams.
   

  

**What Youâ€™ll Bring**
 Proven experience in small, fast\\-paced teams where individuals own large parts of the product (e.g., early\\-stage startups, founding engineering roles, CTO\\-level exposure).
   

  

 Strong command of at least one major backend\\-focused stack:
 **TypeScript, Python, Go, or Java** 
 , with bonus points for TypeScript proficiency.
   

  

 Background as a
 **product engineer, platform engineer, or ML engineer** 
 who has built real systems â€” not limited to infrastructure maintenance or pure data science.
   

  

 Ability to independently break down complex technical problems, debug unfamiliar systems, and accelerate development using tools like Cursor.
   

  

 Solid fundamentals in software engineering and the confidence to work inside large, unfamiliar codebases on short timelines.
   

  

**What Youâ€™ll Work On**
 Build and maintain
 **RL environments and sandbox systems** 
 that help train advanced coding agents used by top AI labs.
   

  

 Rapidly onboard to new codebases (every 4â€“6 weeks), develop a strong understanding, and design RL tasks and scenarios around them.
   

  

 Create engineering challenges, design mocks, write comprehensive test suites, and handle supporting infra pieces to deliver high\\-fidelity RL workflows.
   

  

 Build internal tools, utilities, and frameworks that enable the environment team to prototype and iterate significantly faster.
   

  

 Contribute across the stack when needed, while primarily owning backend behavior, system logic, and environment dynamics.
   

  

**Why Join Us**
 Work with an exceptionally skilled, deeply technical founding team with expertise in reinforcement learning, systems engineering, and large\\-scale product development.
   

  

 Contribute to building one of Indiaâ€™s most talented engineering groups.
   

  

 Collaborate directly with founders in a high\\-trust, high\\-ownership environment.
   

  

 Tackle some of the hardest and most exciting problems in the AI ecosystem, shaping the future of agentic systems.
   

  

 Competitive compensation, strong growth potential, and support from top\\-tier global investors.
   

  

 Bangalore\\-based in\\-person setup, with flexibility for extraordinary remote candidates.
   

  

**Key Skills**
 PyTorch
   

  

 ML model training
   

  

 ML model deployment
   

  

 Backend engineering fundamentals (TypeScript / Python / Go / Java)
   

  

 Full\\-stack development (as required)

title: Quality Assurance Engineer
description:
**About the Role** 




 We are looking for a detail\\-oriented
 **QA Engineer** 
 to ensure the quality, reliability, and performance of our software products. You will work closely with developers, product owners, and project teams to test applications, identify bugs, and improve overall product quality. This role requires strong analytical skills and a passion for delivering flawless user experiences.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Review requirements, specifications, and technical design documents.
* Develop detailed, comprehensive, and well\\-structured test plans and test cases.
* Execute manual test cases for web, mobile, and API testing.
* Identify, document, and track software defects using tools like JIRA.
* Collaborate with developers to troubleshoot issues and verify fixes.
* Perform regression, functional, integration, and system testing.
* Work with automation tools (Selenium, Postman, JMeter, etc.)â€”bonus if experienced.
* Ensure software quality at every stage of development.
* Contribute to continuous improvement of QA processes and standards.



  





**Required Skills** 



* Strong understanding of software testing methodologies and SDLC/STLC.
* Experience in manual testing of web or mobile applications.
* Good knowledge of test case design techniques.
* Proficiency with test management and bug tracking tools (JIRA, TestRail).
* Basic experience with API testing tools like Postman or Swagger.
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills.
* Good communication and documentation skills.



  





**Preferred / Nice\\-to\\-Have Skills** 



* Exposure to automation testing (Selenium/WebDriver, TestNG, JUnit).
* Basic knowledge of SQL for database validation.
* Experience with performance testing tools (JMeter).
* Understanding of CI/CD pipelines and version control (Git).
* Knowledge of scripting (Python/Java) for test automation.



  





**Qualifications** 



* Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, IT, or related field.
* QA certifications (ISTQB) are an added advantage.

title: Full Stack Engineer
description:
**Position:** 
 Full Stack Developer
 



**Location:** 
 Remote
 



  





**Mandatory Skills:** 



* .Net (Core / MVC)
* React.js
* AWS (EC2, Lambda, S3, RDS, DynamoDB, etc.)



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Design, develop, and maintain backend services using .Net Core/MVC and frontend components using React.js.
* Build and scale backend systems on AWS cloud infrastructure using services like EC2, Lambda, S3, RDS, DynamoDB, etc.
* Collaborate closely with frontend developers to ensure seamless integration across the stack.
* Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code that adheres to best practices and coding standards.
* Debug, optimize, and troubleshoot backend issues to ensure optimal performance and reliability.
* Manage AWS services with a focus on uptime, scalability, cost\\-efficiency, and security.
* Conduct code reviews and provide technical mentorship to junior developers.
* Participate in setting up and maintaining CI/CD pipelines.
* Stay updated on current trends and best practices in full stack development and cloud computing.



  





**Required Skills \\& Qualifications:** 



* 6\\+ years of experience in backend development using .Net (.Net Core / MVC).
* Minimum 2 years of hands\\-on experience with React.js.
* At least 1 year of experience with AWS cloud services.
* Strong experience building and maintaining RESTful APIs and working with microservices architecture.
* Proficiency with AWS SDKs, CLI tools, and cloud resource management.
* Understanding of cloud security best practices.
* Familiarity with containerization technologies (e.g., Docker) and orchestration tools (e.g., Kubernetes).
* Proficient with Git and working in Agile environments.
* Solid understanding of both SQL and NoSQL databases.
* Ability to work independently in a remote team environment.



  





**Preferred Qualifications:** 



* AWS Certifications (e.g., AWS Certified Developer, Solutions Architect).
* Experience with monitoring and logging tools (e.g., CloudWatch, ELK stack).
* Exposure to serverless computing and event\\-driven architecture.
* Familiarity with Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools such as Terraform or CloudFormation.
* Experience with DevOps practices and tools, including CI/CD pipelines.

title: Software Developer 4
description:
**Job Description**
 Key Responsibilities
   

  

 Develop, execute, and maintain automation test suites for web, API, and/or mobile applications
   

  

 Collaborate early in the requirement lifecycle to ensure high testability and automation feasibility
   

  

 Design and implement scalable automation frameworks aligned with engineering standards
   

  

 Build and maintain automated tests for iOS/Android applications using Appium or native mobile frameworks
   

  

 Analyze automation results, troubleshoot failures, and drive timely root\\-cause resolution
   

  

 Integrate automated tests into CI/CD pipelines to enable continuous validation and faster releases
   

  

 Support test data creation and ensure stability and availability of automation environments
   

  

 Monitor and report automation execution trends, coverage, and quality insights
   

  

 Maintain clear documentation of automation coverage, framework usage, and configuration details
   

  

 Participate in code reviews and promote best practices for automation quality and reliability
   

  

**Required Skills \\& Experience**
 Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent experience
   

  

 7\\+ years of experience in software test automation or quality engineering
   

  

 Strong programming skills in one or more automation\\-focused languages (Java, JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, C\\#, etc.)
   

  

 Experience with UI automation frameworks (e.g., Selenium/WebDriver, Playwright, Cypress, Appium)
   

  

 Experience in mobile test automation (Appium, XCUITest, Espresso) is a strong plus
   

  

 Experience with API automation tools (e.g., Mocha, REST Assured, Postman, Karate)
   

  

 Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and Git\\-based workflows
   

  

 Familiarty with AI tools and exposure integrating AI tools in automation
   

  

 Strong understanding of functional testing methodologies and regression strategy
   

  

 Ability to debug across browser logs, network, DOM, and backend interactions
   

  

**Preferred Qualifications**
 Familiarity with healthcare, SaaS, or other regulated domains
   

  

 Knowledge of containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes)
   

  

 Experience with BDD frameworks (e.g., Cucumber)
   

  

 Ability to debug mobile app crashes, logs, and network calls
   

  

 Exposure to database validation, monitoring, and observability tools
   

  

 EHR domain knowledge is preferred
   

  

 Soft Skills
   

  

 Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills
   

  

 Clear verbal and written communication
   

  

 Collaboration mindset with cross\\-functional teams
   

  

 Ownership mindset and passion for continuous improvement
   

  

**Qualifications**
 Career Level \\- IC4
   

  

**About Us**
 As a world leader in cloud solutions, Oracle uses tomorrowâ€™s technology to tackle todayâ€™s challenges. Weâ€™ve partnered with industry\\-leaders in almost every sectorâ€”and continue to thrive after 40\\+ years of change by operating with integrity.
   

  

 We know that true innovation starts when everyone is empowered to contribute. Thatâ€™s why weâ€™re committed to growing an inclusive workforce that promotes opportunities for all.
   

  

 Oracle careers open the door to global opportunities where work\\-life balance flourishes. We offer competitive benefits based on parity and consistency and support our people with flexible medical, life insurance, and retirement options. We also encourage employees to give back to their communities through our volunteer programs.
   

  

 Weâ€™re committed to including people with disabilities at all stages of the employment process. If you require accessibility assistance or accommodation for a disability at any point, let us know by emailing accommodation\\-request\\_mb@oracle.com or by calling \\+1 888 404 2494 in the United States.
   

  

 Oracle is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability and protected veteransâ€™ status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Oracle will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records pursuant to applicable law.

* Knowledge of scripting (Python/Java) for test automation.



  





**Qualifications** 



* Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, IT, or related field.
* QA certifications (ISTQB) are an added advantage.

 Mysuru

 Join our team as a Senior Site Reliability Engineer to design and maintain reliable, scalable cloud systems. You will collaborate with development, operations, and security teams to ensure high availability, performance, and resilience of services.
   

  

**Your Role**
* Design, implement, and maintain highly available systems on cloud platforms.
* Develop Infrastructure as Code (IaC) using Terraform, ARM templates, or Bicep.
* Implement monitoring, alerting, and observability solutions.
* Drive incident management, root cause analysis, and postmortem processes.
* Automate operational tasks using PowerShell, Python, or Bash.
* Collaborate on CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps or GitHub Actions.
* Optimize cost, performance, and security of cloud infrastructure.
* Champion SRE best practices like SLIs/SLOs and capacity planning.
* Participate in on\\-call rotations for production support.


**Your Profile**

* Hands\\-on experience with Microsoft Azure or equivalent (AWS/GCP/OpenShift).
* Proficiency in IaC tools (Terraform, ARM, Bicep).
* Strong knowledge of CI/CD, automation, and deployment strategies.
* Expertise in monitoring tools (Azure Monitor, Prometheus, Grafana).
* Scripting skills in PowerShell, Python, or Bash.
* Knowledge of containers and orchestration (Docker, Kubernetes).
* Familiarity with cloud security and compliance.
* Excellent problem\\-solving and communication skills.


**Preferred Experience**
* Multi\\-cloud or hybrid setups.
* Performance tuning and cost optimization in Azure.
* Certifications: Azure Solutions Architect Expert or Kubernetes Administrator/Developer.


**What Youâ€™ll Love About Working Here**
* Competitive compensation and benefits.
* Flexible work options and inclusive culture.
* Continuous learning and certifications in emerging technologies.

From autonomous cars to life\\-saving robots, our digital and software technology experts think outside the box as theyâ€¯provide unique R\\&D and engineering services across all industries. Join us for a career full of opportunities. Where you can make a difference. Where no two days areâ€¯the same.

title: Senior Member Tehnical Staff
description:
**Job Description**
 The opening is a test development position for Oracle Autonomous AI JSON Database (AJD) and Mongo Listener area for Multi\\-Cloud, in the Database Test and Tools development team.
   

  

 Oracle Autonomous AI JSON Database (AJD) is a cloud document database service that makes it simple to develop JSON\\-centric applications. It features NoSQL\\-style document APIs (Oracle SODA and Oracle Database API for MongoDB), serverless scaling, high performance ACID transactions, comprehensive security, and low pay\\-per\\-use pricing. AJD automates provisioning, configuring, tuning, scaling, patching, encrypting, and repairing of databases, eliminating database management and delivering 99\\.95% availability. AJD will be part of the Multi\\-Cloud offering of Oracle with GCP, AWS and Azure.
   

  

 Design, develop, troubleshoot and debug software programs for databases, cloud services, applications, tools, networks etc. As a member of the Oracle's Database Cloud Services division, you will actively design, develop and use AI agents, bots and tools to design, develop and deploy applications that run in Oracle's Cloud Infrastructure, and certify the applications against the Cloud software.
   

  

 Career Level \\- IC3
   

  

**Responsibilities**
**Details on the opening:**
 Autonomous AI Database Cloud Services Test and Tools Development team is looking for bright and talented engineers from top tier institutes to apply their ingenuity to test Oracleâ€™s flagship product. It is an opportunity to demonstrate your skills as a Test Development Engineer for Oracleâ€™s Autonomous cloud enabled platforms by developing cloud enabled tests for various features in Database, Cloud services and Engineered systems.
   

  

 We need to design, build, develop and deploy AI bots, agents and tools/framework in order to develop and test applications/scripts and automate the test setup needed for the features of Oracle Kernel code we are testing. These test programs runs fully automated on a server farm \\- so our test framework need to configure, run test applications/inject failures, and verify results by itself. Most of the features would need very specific test programs/frameworks. Automating test running, proactive test automation and automating the automation are the primary goals of the team. This involves building software and applications that are similar to customer environment and automate their runs.
   

  

 The opening is for an individual contributor position in Autonomous AI Database Cloud test and tools development team.
   

  

 This is a programming position as all the tests/frameworks are applications which should exercise a feature in the yet to be released version of Oracle product.
   

  

 In this position, you will be working very closely with the feature development team to create a test plan/tools/infrastructure needed for the feature.
   

  

 You will also be reviewing the feature specifications (Functional \\& Design spec) before it is finalized as your inputs from a customer perspective might be important in the implementation.
   

  

 Our primary development platform is Linux, and depending on the area you work on the coding would involve Perl, Python, C or Java to develop test programs. The challenge and the advantage is in understanding the technology and apply it in a practical setup.
   

  

**What you gain:**
* Hands\\-on work on building AI agents and bots, assistance frameworks and infrastructure
* Exposure to cutting edge technologies/products in cloud space
* Gain in\\-depth experience of various Oracle database features \\- JSON Duality View, Mongo Listener, Multitenant, In\\-Memory Database, Active Data Guard, True Cache, SQL PL/SQL, Data Vault, Auditing, Redaction and Encryption
* Work with core team of highly motivated and enthusiastic engineers from top colleges to build best in class Database products and Cloud services
* Deep dive into Database/Cluster/Cloud services domains
* Exposure to Open source technologies Docker, Jira, Kafka, ML
* Opportunity to automate and build tools, infrastructures, micro services and in\\-house applications that have enterprise wide impact


**The group:**
**'Oracle Autonomous AI Database test \\& tools development** 
 ' group works on the upcoming releases of Oracle AI database server, Autonomous AI Database cloud services \\& Engineered systems enveloping a wide range of technologies.
   

  

 The group with its state of the art development infrastructure and practices, helps shape technology that has been important for a large number of Fortune 2000 and other companies. The group foresees Database product and Autonomous Database Cloud Services usage scenarios and develops automated test framework, tests, and tools to simulate real life scenarios to ensure that customers get the highest quality Autonomous Database Cloud Services.
   

  

**Requirements:**
* B.Tech/M.Tech C.S. from a premier institution
* Experience building intelligent automation solutions (agents, bots) using LLMs and AI/ML for test execution and defect triage.
* Exposure and experience in any of the languages or scripts \\- Java, C, SQL, Perl, Python
* Excellent problem solving and analytical skills
* Knowledge of software development processes (design, development, and testing)
* Work on multiple projects concurrently in a fast\\-paced, exciting, and rapidly growing environment
* Candidates with good relational database concepts and fundamentals is desirable
* Experience with Oracle or any high end relational databases as application developer (server side) is desirable
* Ability and enthusiasm to learn new technologies, adeptness in seeking solutions to complex problems
* Good verbal and written communication


 Design, develop, troubleshoot and debug software programs for databases, applications, tools, networks etc.
   

  

 As a member of the software engineering division, you will assist in defining and developing software for tasks associated with the developing, debugging or designing of software applications or operating systems. Provide technical leadership to other software developers. Specify, design and implement modest changes to existing software architecture to meet changing needs.
   

  

 Duties and tasks are varied and complex needing independent judgment. Fully competent in own area of expertise. 4\\-5\\+ years of software engineering or related experience.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 Career Level \\- IC3
   

  

**About Us**
 As a world leader in cloud solutions, Oracle uses tomorrowâ€™s technology to tackle todayâ€™s challenges. Weâ€™ve partnered with industry\\-leaders in almost every sectorâ€”and continue to thrive after 40\\+ years of change by operating with integrity.
   

  

 We know that true innovation starts when everyone is empowered to contribute. Thatâ€™s why weâ€™re committed to growing an inclusive workforce that promotes opportunities for all.
   

  

 Oracle careers open the door to global opportunities where work\\-life balance flourishes. We offer competitive benefits based on parity and consistency and support our people with flexible medical, life insurance, and retirement options. We also encourage employees to give back to their communities through our volunteer programs.
   

  

 Weâ€™re committed to including people with disabilities at all stages of the employment process. If you require accessibility assistance or accommodation for a disability at any point, let us know by emailing accommodation\\-request\\_mb@oracle.com or by calling \\+1 888 404 2494 in the United States.
   

  

 Oracle is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability and protected veteransâ€™ status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Oracle will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records pursuant to applicable law.
